website_summaries.verdict: A stunning dollhouse with a multitude of realistic details, breathtaking dimensions, and enough room for a whole family of dolls. Whether you’re looking for a large dollhouse for siblings to share or simply to spoil one very lucky child, this is awe-inspiring set is sure to wow kids of all ages.
pros: Standing 52” tall and boasting 4 levels with 8 rooms, kids have lots to explore and do
Comes with beautifully crafted furniture for every room, so little interior designers can let their imaginations run wild as they decorate their mansion
Accommodates fashion dolls up to 12” tall
Durable construction and large dimensions will last for years
cons: Due to its size and intricate design, assembly can be time-consuming

website_summaries.verdict: At 4 feet tall, this is a serious dollhouse. Built to last and includes all the accessories a kid needs.
pros: Sturdy build and large size provides enough room for multiple kids to play at once
cons: A few houses were missing some of the furniture upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Well Made & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This doll house has been played with for the past two years by my two kiddos (and their cousins) and it has held up beautifully. The large size is ideal for more than one child to play at the same time. It's so big that my four-year-old stands on a stool to reach the top floor! It's a great value, pretty to look at and includes so many nice details and furnishings. Definitely recommend it. It takes some time to put together, but it will last for many years. (If this review was helpful for you, please give it a "thumbs up" below, thanks!)
customer_reviews.author: Veggie Gardening Gal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy when properly built
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy when properly built, a little on the small size and the walls are not properly insulated, the bedroom is too small, the fridge does not work, the elevator has no electicity, and toilet doesnt flush. No instructions on how to prevent a baby from falling 3 stories when sleeping in the bedroom, worst baby crib ever! But maybe it make a great dollhouse.
customer_reviews.author: tnguyenhth

customer_reviews.title: Poor design / quality
customer_reviews.text: As many reviewers state, it takes a long time to put together. A number of the parts were not cut correctly and also arrived damaged. Further, the "floors" do not hold up well and started to bend/warp almost immediately. The third floor by the elevator cannot hold any of the furniture because it bends down due to lack of a support due to the elevator. KidKraft will send replacement parts but the thing is already put together and will take substantial work to disassemble and reassemble, and even then, I suspect the same problem will arise. My kid will still play with it but for the poor quality relative to the cost along with the terrible instructions, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Too much money for what you're getting.  Extremely time-consuming to put together.
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old likes this but I would usually expect to get a better quality product for the money that I spent. This was extremely time consuming to put together. Once put together the items are a little wobbly or an even or you can see glue pieces. The elevator is kind of hard to push up and down. I kind of expected more wooden solid pieces than thin walls and floors. Comes with a lot of furniture but no dolls. Overall I probably wouldn't spend this much money again over this dollhouse. But it is very cute and my daughter seems to like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Paper on wood already peeling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dollhouse based on all the positive reviews but I am highly disappointed. All of the paper that is glued onto the wood for decoration is already peeling off in less than a week of my daughter playing with it. She is 5 and not even playing with in a rough way. A lot of it came with the edges loose and it just keeps getting worse. What poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mach

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: So this is a great product for the price now that i can say is true but my one star review was because after using it for maybe 2 weeks the elevator broke. So unfortunate so i guesd you get what you pay for. I have a cinderella house which cost me way more than this one but its been two years and its still the same. I was disappointed because i loved it so much and it was literally bigger than my 5 year old twins so they loved it so much as well.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: This house is incredible! All told, it took my husband about 3 hours to put together, but I'm sure this will be well worth it. At this price, I was amazed by the quality of the materials. The floors are the thinnest pieces, with the walls being very thick material, and the furniture is all nice, chunky wood. My daughter wanted the Barbie Dream House, and I feel a lot better about buying wooden toys than plastic. This feels like a quality product, and I'm sure it will provide years of play!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Huge and beautiful doll house
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge, beautiful doll house. It's taller than my 9 year old daughter. She loves it! It fits many Barbie and other 12" dolls with ease. It looks overwhelming to put together but once you separate the parts you can start to see how it goes. My adult son put it together with a little help from me in 4 hours. The illustrated instructions were a little vague when it came to which sides were up, but we figured it out. Looking at the picture of it on Amazon helped. All in all, it is an amazing doll house, especially right now that it's on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Popesco

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations and my girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would order this again in a heartbeat! All three of my daughters (5, 3.5 and 1.5) LOVE this house. It’s large, so if you’re cramped for space, I’d look for something smaller. The furniture that comes with it is excellent quality. I did use some wood glue to attach legs on the piano and base of the clock just so they wouldn’t get lost; however, the overall quality for the price of this dollhouse FAR exceeds what I expected. I did tons of research before buying a dollhouse, and I’m really glad I went with this one. It took my husband about 3 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: AKspr

customer_reviews.title: Warping floors and only 6 months old.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 6 months ago for my twin 2 year old granddaughters. The floors are badly warping, the bedroom, bathroom, nursery, and behind the elevator have floors bowing really bad that the furniture won't stay in place. Also, the garage door won't stay closed. Paid way too much money for this poor quality. I was hoping it would last them many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So, I read reviews before buying. I knew better than to wait last minute build. And I'm glad I put it together early. The instructions are not very detailed and I screwed up the orientation 3 times. Really ticked me off. But eventually I got it. But part of it might have been because it was late and I was tired. But their instructions need to be better labeled. Some parts came broken and when it was together we tried to move it, it didn't feel very sturdy. Like we might break it. But when it is up and stationary it is totally fine and is perfect for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Easy to assemble w/ clear instructions (I put it together alone without any issues), extremely cute, perfect size for barbies & Disney fashion dolls, huge, & the furniture included is sturdy. Con: It’s not all wood, like I assumed it was. With the exception of a few small pieces, the entire house is made of a thin drywall board material. I was really disappointed about that, because it definitely takes the quality down & probably won’t survive more than a handful of years. Disappointing for a KidKraft item. All in all, it’s a cute dollhouse & my daughter loves it. If you’re not looking for heirloom quality, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Koehn

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Purchase This Year
customer_reviews.text: This was a Santa present for my girls. They adore it. It’s so much larger and sturdier than a plastic “Barbie” house. BIGGEST TIP: Do NOT put this together Christmas Eve. It took myself and a friend four hours to assemble with a cordless drill. Power tools (drill) aren’t required, but they are highly recommended! The directions aren’t entirely clear. I’ve put IKEA furniture together that was simpler than this. ON A POSITIVE NOTE: Once you get the feel for the directions, it simple to understand and follow. It is also a huge house with tons of furnishings that come pre assembled. It’s colorful and sturdy. I’m so glad I bought this instead of a plastic home.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Daniel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, GREAT, GREAT, BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update... It’s after Christmas and my granddaughter absolutely loves this house. She literally played with this for 3 hours straight. I cannot express in words how beautiful and detailed this play house is. It’s very sturdy and comes with wall mounts for extra safety for your kids. It also came fully furnished. Every piece of furniture is well made with wood. The furniture was packed carefully in separate boxes. No assembly required. There are complete sets of furniture for each room of the house. The size of the house and furniture is definitely made for Barbie dolls. I’m 5 ft 2 inches. This house is just below my chin. I can’t say enough positive things about this house!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good looking.....BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doll house for my daughter. She liked it, and that concludes the story. That being said, it took us (me and my helper) almost FOUR trying hours to assemble it. The manual is helpful, but its illustrations lack clarity as to which side goes where--left or right, up or down, you get the idea. A tutorial video on Youtube will definitely come in handy. Also, an electric screw driver will shorten the process. I used a manual screw driver. Thank God I don't have to repeat this process, ever! Four hours isn't four minutes. It freakin' sucked!
customer_reviews.author: Marwan

customer_reviews.title: Great Barbie House
customer_reviews.text: We knew from reviews that it would take awhile to put together...and it did take us about 2 1/2 hours, but we planned for that so there was no issue. It went together well for the most part, there was a couple times the boards cracked a little while screwing pieces together. The only thing that bothered me is that many of the screws are colored, but some are not, it's somewhat helpful but the instructions don't tell you what color screws to use in which spots. If they showed the color of the screw in the instructions, that would have been helpful. Great product all-in-all. Once it's together it is very sturdy and beautiful. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustan

customer_reviews.title: Huge doll house!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a birthday gift for my daughter. This doll house was so huge! Be sure to have a safe, open space for your doll house when being built. Moving this doll house can be hard because it's not all that sturdy. Took me 3 hours to put together alone. Instructions were clear and easy to follow. My girls love it and play with it often. I love how it comes with extra barbie items such as beds, baths, chairs..etc. Overall, it was a great birthday present for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Kid magnet, but HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the dimensions more carefully. This dollhouse practically needs a room to itself to keep it in. NOT for small apartments! However, this is this product’s only flaw. It’s pretty, kids love it, the furniture is plentiful and colorful, And even the elevator works! Not saying it’s easy to put together, but it’s not super-diffficult, either. You’ll get there; just don’t wait until the night before Christmas. It’s sturdy enough that if you get it for your three year-old and take reasonable care of it, she can play with it until she’s a pre-teen.
customer_reviews.author: loves lit

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale and for the price it is great! I don’t think I would have purchased at regular price though. Everything about the dollhouse is in working order except for an area on the 2nd floor near the elevator. The floor wants to bend down a little and no amount of pushing it the opposite way makes a difference. So any furniture put there wants to slant downwards. Other than that it is a nice dollhouse and our daughter loves it. Putting together took about 2 hours and some of the instructions aren’t very clear. Husband said to pay attention to patterns on “wallpaper” and flooring and bolts are colored to match up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Shi Rod

customer_reviews.title: Go on Youtube and look at the negative reviews before you waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are absolutely terrible. No color pictures to match the panels to and some of the pieces are missing numbers. I have wasted over 8 hours trying to figure out how to assemble this garbage. I went to Youtube and tried to look at assembly photos but not all were shown. This was by far the worse mistake i've made in a long time. My granddaughter will just have to settle for dolls this Christmas. I recommend anyone research before you waste your time and money. I doubt this garbage was made in America!
customer_reviews.author: LarryM

customer_reviews.title: As stated before.. great after assembly recovery
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews but this thing had me sweating and crying in the corner. The instructions are insanely unclear and I must have put on the pieces backwards at least 7 times. Nothing I have ever put together has frustrated me as much as this product. I recommend the Costco version that comes reassembled to save yourself popped blood vessels. The dollhouse itself is wonderful once you recover from assembly. My daughter loves it! Just give yourself a couple of days to build it and make sure to have some wine to increase patience lol
customer_reviews.author: MommyPanda

customer_reviews.title: Missing some parts
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t take long to assemble. Doesn’t seem as high quality as I thought it would be. It’s a bit flimsy. Mine is missing the door handles for the garage and a way to hang the chandelier. It doesn’t fit the classic Barbie car in the garage but maybe it will fit something smaller like a bike or maybe a Barbie Jeep, not sure. I’m happy I got this when it was only $94 or I’d be pretty upset about quality and missing parts. My 5 year old is happy with it though so that’s what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dollhouse for little girls!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughters for Christmas and they play with it for hours! They are 2 and 3 so they cannot reach them top floor yet but will be able to in a year or two. It’s well made and comes with lovely furniture. The only negative is that it took my son and daughter-in-law over 5 hours to put together and the instructions were not great. But they said it was worth it! They use their Disney dolls to play in it but its great for Barbies too!
customer_reviews.author: Nessie

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Barbie dream house and get this. Worth the money and you save over dream house.
customer_reviews.text: Directions sucked but watching some YouTube videos, I got through it. Took about 4 hours to put together as others have said. Did it in two days. Very sturdy and well worth the money. Got my Daughter this for Christmad and I know we will have it for many many years. Only this I am dissapointed in is the top floor of my house wasn't measured correctly so my top floor is kind of bubbling upwards but not a big deal and you cant really notice. My 4 year old doesnt care.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Huge dollhouse! Horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse is beautiful and comes with nice quality dollhouse furniture and accessories. But it is HUGE! Almost too big! but it is a really awesome dollhouse for the price and good for kids to grow into. My 4 year old can reach the 3rd floor well. The downside is that the instructions are absolutely horrible. They don't tell you where anything goes and the screws are color coded but don't tell you which pieces go where. Took a solid hour to put together. I recommend using a drill for this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Elliott

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT HESITATE TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: This dollshouse is HUGE! Its over 4 ft tall. I'm 5'3 and it comes up to my mouth. Cute sturdy wooden furniture. My daughter LOVED IT. Said how much better it was than the Barbie brand Dream House she sees in youtube videos she had originally wanted. Said 5 day shipping bit got here in 2.5.. Definitely get it for you little girl!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 2.5 yr old Pro's: Very good quality, a majority of the furniture was sturdy and made well, pre-drilled holes are a plus. Con's: Instructions were horrendous, some of the screws are color coded but there's no direction as to what parts they should be used for . I found myself swapping out screws that I needed for other sections (and this is after reading other reviews). A couple of the furniture pieces could have been made better, i.e. grandfather clock is basically a stand. Overall, very nice doll house, kids will love it. This is 100% better than the mostly plastic Barbie sets.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Heater

customer_reviews.title: disapointing
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to some of these reviews and I should have bought the doll house I saw at Costco because this house was disappointing. I was surprised because I had bought a doll house from kids crafts before years ago that was very sturdy. This dollhouse from what my husband told me was cardboard. The alignment is off as you can see from my provided pictures. And one picture showing the wood...correction cardboard cracking when my husband put it together. Don't waste your money find another house. I'm sure this house won't last two-and-a-half years like the other kids craft house we had before.
customer_reviews.author: kylee

customer_reviews.title: Makes kids happy but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the house which is why it got 3 stars, however, the house is pretty flimsy. When assembling I had to flip it over and the screw pulled right through the weak bored. Also the boards were cracking in some places when I screwed them together. Ours is also missing a piece (the wall between the bathroom and bedroom). The directions are not very clear. They don’t specify which direction to face the pieces so I had to redo parts of it often after finding out it was upside down. Other than that, it’s huge, it fits barbies, my 6 yr had a fantastic birthday. Not sure the house will make it to her 7th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa olson

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love it
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't say the instructions were bad but they weren't good. There are different colored screws, you'll notice this about 25 minutes and 40 screws in. There also isn't an actual picture of the designs on the instructions, so if you aren't particularly observant you might have to take panels of and redo them for the designs to match correctly. The installation in general is simple. But not all the pieces are cut/planed correctly. So some pieces are uneven, just a bit of drilling can fix this though.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick M Creed

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It took sometime to build because the instructions wasn't enough and got a slight confusion about certain things. Got the job done eventually very durable doll house and huge. My daughter love it! Be careful of unpacking the parts because we couldn't find the blanket to the bed. Plus we almost lost the leg to the piano which we also found out the legs don't snap in good to it. Might need some gorilla glue to ensure that it won't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: chasidy

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting fun for all ages of childhood.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great investment. I bought this item Christmas 2016 and it still entertains all children 2 years old to 10 years old. It's incredibly sturdy. It was NOT easy to assemble. The directions were a bit confusing, my Aunt - who mounted her own TVs, couldn't figure it out. But I followed them closely and for the first time in my life constructed something successfully. Elevator sticks and doesn't go to first floor - which is weird. But my daughter and all her guests loved this house.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: DIRECTIONS ARE USELESS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars if the directions were even slightly worth the paper they were written on. Two adults with college degrees and a carpenter couldn't read the useless diagrams. Not worth the savings to spend 6 hours putting this together. I would have rather spent the extra money on having someone put it together than wasting my time. Worst gift I have ever bought my kids, ever. I would rather step on legos than do this again.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Directions are in pictures--difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for our granddaughters, age 2-3/4 and 5 3/4. My husband is excellent with putting things together, however he says the directions are very poor. They don't say which side of the part is up or down. He has to put it together, look at it and do it over again. I admire his patience, however for being given such a high rating, I think it should have better, written directions. I suspect our granddaughters will enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Color instructions please
customer_reviews.text: The assembling process took me about 3 hours to complete. The slightly annoying part is that the instructions are in black and white. I was several steps into the assembling when I noticed that the screws had different colors too. So I had to take it apart and assemble it again. Also it was hard to tell which piece should be facing in what direction.. so I had to google different images of the dollhouse to figure it out. Other than that it is Definitely worth it. My niece spends hours playing with it. I’ll We put our own finishing touch by adding some Christmas lights :) Well designed doll house. Highly recommended ~
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge and has a ton of extras.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't put it together. That's not what grandparents are for. But I got good reviews from the one who did put it together, and she was astonished by the fact that it is really big, great for any 12-inch dolls, and has amazing details. My granddaughter was enthralled, and even my grandson was excited about it. They have not ignored it yet! Not a "bored 2 days after receipt" kind of gift. Sturdier than the cardboard and plastic trash sold most places. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Celtacia

customer_reviews.title: Love the dollhouse, instructions could be more clear
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made doll house. It’s taller than my seven year old and she loves it. Made for Barbie size dolls or smaller. Instructions could have been more clear on which direction parts faced (we had to unscrew several pieces to flip around once we realized they were backwards or upside down). Definitely need at least two people and two hours to put together. Overall we’re very pleased and would purchase from kidkraft again!
customer_reviews.author: DWhaley

customer_reviews.title: Great Dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this dollhouse and never seems to tire of playing with it. Very sturdy and well built. A little difficult to put together but not too bad. Had to buy people to go with it and it could use some more furniture. Wish there were additional accessories that you could purchase to go with it, but can’t find any. I would definitely purchase this dollhouse as a gift again. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: What a massive, solid wood doll house that easily accommodates Barbie size dolls. Clever and pretty furniture and decor. Kiddos love it! Takes a while for the adults to put it together but it is well worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kosci

customer_reviews.title: Three hours with a 7 year old!
customer_reviews.text: This was much larger than I anticipated. I’m very happy with it. Very easy to assemble, clear instructions. It took me and my 7 year old about 3 hours to put it together. I encouraged her to do it as well so she could value the process and TAKE CARE OF IT. It means a lot more to her now that she got to help. Fits barbies, her 12inch action figures, and Even her TY beanie boos.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessFalvo

customer_reviews.title: Ruined Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be responsible, and buy our daughter's "big gift" early. We successfully hid it in the garage, and were so excited to put it together on Christmas Eve. After the kids went bed, we happily opened the box to begin assembly, but quickly realized... there were NO INSTRUCTIONS... NO HARDWARE, and NO STORES WERE OPEN, it being Christmas Eve and all. So, we had nothing to put under the tree. I can't describe to you how unhappy I am with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey M Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Best dollhouse out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great dollhouse for the money. We did a lot of research to find the perfect dollhouse for our 4 year old daughter. This is it. Perfect size that she can use now with room to grow. Fits her barbies and come with all the accessories she needed. We call this the babysitter because it entertains for hours. It's big enough to allow us or others to play too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: talyn

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse was a huge disappointment. The only reason i didn't return it was because it was my daughter's birthday present and she loved it. The instructions were awful thank god for youtube! The pieces are peeling up! It is definitely not a long term dollhouse. I would say save your money and buy something that is worth your money. I would never pay full price for this. I will never recommend this hunk of junk to anyone ever!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: My Girls love it. Building it was painful.
customer_reviews.text: The garage door knob didn't go in all the way. The screws were labelled, but the manual doesn't say when to use the different colored screws. Save the Amazon picture bc you're going to need to look at it to know which wall is on which side. The manual doesn't have pictures just labels! I started building at 10pm and finished at 3:30am. Thankfully ALMOST all the furnitures came assembled! 😀 My girls love it. Btw, the nursery is in the attic of this doll house...poor baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece for Christmas and she loves it. It has given her hours of playtime. Her cousins visited her and it's kept them engaged, their imagination is being revealed by the minute. She absolutely, positively loves it. The size is great because it life size & she's able to play with multiple people & they're able to move around, engage in conversations and enjoy rearranging the furniture, playing with all her dolls, and just have fun. The fun part is her cousins don't want to go home 😂. So I have my hands filled with 3 little princesses 😍
customer_reviews.author: Nadine McClain

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong part and backing was painted where torn
customer_reviews.text: We must have gotten the wrong piece for the roof over the garden room because we can’t attach it AT ALL. This thing takes a considerable amount of time to put together and the instructions are awful. I kept having to pull up a picture of it on Amazon to figure out how things should go. Also, I had several spots where it was painted due to the backing be torn. Not what I would expect from a brand new product. Also, I can tell already that the backing is going to peel. Especially around the edges. I’m sure my daughter will love it but I’m disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous instructions manual in black and white
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this around black Friday time. It takes a very long time to assemble. It took me 6 hours to put together. I have knocked off two stars because of length of assembly time, absolutely ridiculous black and white instructions which made too much of rework necessary and due to warping of the second and third levels on assembly and due to hole drilled on wrong side of product. I have since then ordered replacement parts from kidkraft (free) but it's going to be hell to disassemble and reassemble. My daughter loves the playhouse though.
customer_reviews.author: Azeez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid dollhouse😎👍
customer_reviews.text: I like this dollhouse it was a Christmas purchase for my niece. It is pretty stready, big enough to for multiple children to play in [(with minimal conflict) I'm 5'8 and it comes to my upper chest, between neck and breast area] the only complaint is that while assembling some slits for the back drops were unaligned making the screws not fit, but we just trimmed the extra wood and that worked. Kinda heavy so will need a team lift, it took about 3 hrs to put together with 2 people working on Christmas eve, we started at 8pm got done at 11pm. Overall good though.
customer_reviews.author: Dezerae

customer_reviews.title: Such a good product
customer_reviews.text: i recently bought this dollhouse for my 3 year old cousin for christmas and i just know she’s gonna love it!!! i put it together already and it took about 4-5 hours but i never got super frustrated building it!! the directions are good but can get confusing with which side to add the screws and such, just go to youtube and look it up!! it’s really such a beautiful piece of furniture and it also comes with screws to bolt it into the wall... however i was missing a piece, thankfully not a major piece but it was really easy to get the replacement! the furniture it comes with also is really good quality definitely worth every penny!’
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Caraway

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed best doll house you could buy
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the quality of this doll house. It needs more stars than 5 my granddaughter was so excited she got this house. The wood that it is made of very sturdy and good quality and the furniture is made out of some type of wood very sturdy. It will last her a lifetime the quality is so good. For the money you will not be disappointed great job kidkraft for such an awesome doll house
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I love this house! I wish I was a kid again! Instructions suck but my husband looked them up on you tube and he built it himself and trust me he doesnt like to put stuff together it took him about 2 hours after watching the you tube video. Actually my 8 year old help him hold the stuff together. But it was all worth it it’s huge!
customer_reviews.author: thalias

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, large dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: I was quite impressed with this dollhouse. It was well made and game well packaged - no real damage to the parts/pieces (only just a little wear on some edges, very minor and not really noticeable). Assembly wasn't too awful bad either. Directions were pretty good (did reference some pics online early in the process to make sure I was correct). Took me about 4 hours. Only tricky part was sliding the back panels in an getting second side attached (needed a second set of hands). The numerous accessories are well made and added to the overall end product. I think our girls will be very happy and have years of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: doughboy

customer_reviews.title: "sigh" 😠😡🤬😤😐😑
customer_reviews.text: We decided to do Christmas a bit early as my daughter goes to see the other half of her family for Christmas this year unfortunately I Wouldnt know how this looks put together as it didn't come with any screws or bolts to put it together at all I will rewrite this review once.... -.-..... I pack this back up and return it to Amazon and get a new one Much disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Shows wear over time
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size for young girls. At purchase mine were 5 and 3. Love that it came with accessories such as bed, table, chairs, piano, crib, etc. When my husband put it together one of the floor pieces was slightly bowed so it appeared to sag a bit. At the time no big deal. Now just over 2 years later, many of the wall and floor pieces are bowed making it difficult for the furniture to sit level. My youngest still plays with it and doesn’t seem to mind the “damage” but it will most likely end up getting repurposed soon.
customer_reviews.author: joslyn b

customer_reviews.title: Well made wooden doll house
customer_reviews.text: Assembly required. Watch out for the various colored screws as they end up matching the walls later. That is the hardest part about putting it together. Took 1 (somewhat handy) person ~1.5 hours to assemble. This is huge, and absolutely beautiful. Its not too heavy, but made of wood. With reasonable care this will probably hold up for years. Its not the sort of heirloom you will pass down to the next generation, but its worlds better than similarly priced plastic doll houses. Its classy and timeless. I can barely wait until Christmas. I know my daughter will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Red Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality. The decor is darling. It did take almost 6 hours of patience to assemble but it fit together nicely. All parts were enclosed. One wall was chipped so we called Kidcraft and they immediately sent another wall. The furniture is sturdy and so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Lots of Furniture, Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful. While it was a bit difficult to put together, the end result was well worth it. The instructions on how to put it together were good, it's just the work takes a lot of time. The furniture is so well made! My granddaughter absolutely loves it and asked if she could stay home from school to play with it (ummm...no). She and her friends spend so much time playing with this. It's money well spent. One another thing--the elevator is just too cool. This dollhouse will last my granddaughter for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: MaimonW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse is beautiful, once you get it together. After you glue the edges that are peeling off back on. And drill the holes that somehow got left out. Our granddaughter loves it, so that is what matters most. Gave it 3 stars because for the price you should not have to glue anything, and the pre-drilled holes should actually line up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit for our 5 yo. Assembly took two of us and even with that it took 3.5 hrs, so be prepared. Instructions definitely need a revamp. Seriously took too much time to figure out sides/layouts. Frustrating! 4 stars bc of this. I used a dab of wood glue here and there to reinforce certain areas and it’s as sturdy as an ox. Happy customers!
customer_reviews.author: rainedropsonroses

customer_reviews.title: A few missing pieces in box but daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were ok. There seemed to be a lot of extra screws. And they don’t tell you which color screws to use but there are specific colors to use in specific places. Had two missing pieces which was easy to order on their website but annoying that we couldn’t put the house together for my daughter on Christmas. Once we had all the pieces it wasn’t too hard to put together but plan on an hour or two. My daughter loves it and that made the annoyance worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: DECARROLL

customer_reviews.title: Huge & beautiful dollhouse.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful dollhouse and its huge and gorgeous and well built. I would definatly buy it again. The only reason it has 4 stars and not 5 is because the directions are horrible to follow...that needs a huge improvement. We did get a few broken pieces in our box and we tried calling several times and it was a 4 hr wait time. So I emailed them and it was taken care of within 48 hrs and sent us the new parts shipped to our door. All in all we love the dollhouse and I think its definitely worth the price and will last a lot longer than those overpriced plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great doll mansion!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: huge dollhouse my daughter loves! Lots of accessories (but not too many) Cons: Some of the components are pressed cardboard, and the rest is particle board, so don't get it wet. It takes about 2 hours to build. It is difficult to move, and will probably need to be built in the location you are going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarAaron

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up with minor use
customer_reviews.text: Well it was a 4-5 star review at first. However, my kid barely plays with it and it’s bowing on the middle level. The furniture doesn’t stand up right anymore because of it. I really thought it would last longer for the price but sadly for a dust collector it’s not holding up😢screws have fallen out too. All were right when assembled. It hasn’t moved either.
customer_reviews.author: nalz

customer_reviews.title: Huge dollhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived damaged, but it didn't disturb the integrity of this doll house. It took my husband several hours on Christmas eve to put it together for our kids. Pieces were all labeled perfectly and everything was accounted for. Reminded me of assembling Ikea furniture. Very happy kids, not too bad on the price as we got it on sale with free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: D. Browne

customer_reviews.title: All together, I am happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit overwhelming when you first open the box. However, everything is labeled properly and fits together nicely. I would definitely recommend looking at the photos taken for the product on Amazon while you are putting it together. The instructions are black and white and if you’re not paying attention, the garage area can be a bit confusing. The area behind the elevator on the third floor Is a bit flimsy. You could remedy this by bracing it from below and adding a few drops from a glue gun. My daughter is also a little bit harder on things and maybe she put our cat in the dollhouse bedroom... All together, I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Have an adult beverage or few handy during assembly
customer_reviews.text: HUGE dollhouse for the price! Sturdy, and should hopefully last a couple years before the kids destroy it (because why take care of anything nice). Cons: Assembly instructions make Ikea instructions seem easy to follow. Mine was missing the chandelier ceiling mount bracket and the handles for the garage door ... Not the end of the world since I can swing by Lowe's and get suitable replacement pieces, but I obviously would have preferred to get all the expected hardware in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this to anyone. We just received it and we had to make holes in the boards. It's also very flimsy. For the price I expected more. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ebony

customer_reviews.title: Worst assembly instructions EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 40 years old and have done plenty of carpentry and handiwork. This has the worst Instructions I’ve ever seen. Literally nothing but pictures and they don’t even describe which side goes which way. You will do almost everything twice guaranteed. Thanks KidKraft. I literally stayed up until Christmas morning doing this. 4+ hrs if you’re good.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Navarro

customer_reviews.title: It is a really nice doll house
customer_reviews.text: For a person to put this together in two hours, they would have to be doing two things at the same time. Reccommend getting a friend to help you put this together. Instructions were simple illistrations with no notes or warnings. Once you get it assembled, It is a really nice doll house. My grandaughter loves it and spends hours playing with her dolls and stuffed animals. Quite sturdy. Comes with a wall mount so that it doesn't tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this house - well, my daughter does :) She is almost 5. She asked for a Barbie Dream House for Christmas, but I got this one instead. I was worried she would notice the difference, which she did, but she said "It's not the Dream House, it's BIGGER and BETTER!" - so all ended well. It's a great house, the furniture is really impressive. It's nice and cute. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Errica Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent house.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute dollhouse. Very well made. It took us 3 hours to put together. The only disappointment is that the back of the house is just plain white. It's made to be anchored to a wall, for safety reasons. I was hoping that it looked pretty on the back and could be moved away from the wall for larger children. Still a pretty excellent buy, considering the barbie dream houses are pure plastic junk and cost more. The furniture with this house is really nice and well made. The only piece that is kind of cheap is the chandelier. It's just flimsy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's been asking for a doll house for the longest time. We finally got her one for her birthday. Everyone loves playing with it! It took some time to put it all together, but the instructions were very clear. The doll house is very tall, over 5 feet and can fit Barbie dolls instead of regular doll house people. Some of the wooden furniture came with marks on them, and some of the wallpaper was peeling in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Moshe D

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this doll house unless you have plenty of space it is HUGE , and I am talking as tall as an adult and not super well made so if kids try to climb on it , it could collapse. Takes a long time to assemble . My kids got bored with it after one use and there it sits . I"m reselling it on market place . Oh well !
customer_reviews.author: angeline

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this thing took about 3 hours of solo construction to be upstanding. Move slow and discern the directions carefully, it'll go much faster. One tip you don't realize until later in the construction (its not in the directions) is that some of the screws that show externally are actually colored to match the print on the house. There is one vertically standing piece on the third floor that is not super secure, but other than that, this house is amazing. More detailed directions would be awesome and a different type of vertically standing piece would make it great.
customer_reviews.author: mc_anders

customer_reviews.title: 4-year-old over the moon about this house
customer_reviews.text: My friend's 4-year-old daughter is over the moon about this house. Not enough stars. My friend struggled a little bit putting it together. However, we had fair warning from all the Amazon reviews, so we set aside an evening just to assemble the house. The instructions were vague. I can't speak to sturdiness yet, as we have just assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awe-inspiring!
customer_reviews.text: I did not put it together, so I cannot comment on the assembly process but my friend said it went together very well. He's a master at putting dollhouses together, so it did not take him long. There was a missing piece, but I contacted KidKraft and they sent it right out to me! Great customer service. It is a spectacular house and anyone would be thrilled to get it. It is so nice that my friend ended up getting the same one for his daughters! Now that is a testament to how spectacular it is!
customer_reviews.author: Gwgirl

customer_reviews.title: Well made and simple design, will last us years of fun
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun and well made dollhouse. It took about 1 1/2 hours for my father and husband to put this together. The house itself is lighter than I expected but very simple and cute designs. The little wooden furniture is well made and more durable than the flimsy plastic often used in dollhouses. The colors are vibrant and the design is simple enough that it leaves room for imagination and versatility in using the rooms in the home. Taller than I was expecting but overall a great addition to our daughters play time!
customer_reviews.author: RELLEC

customer_reviews.title: Trust the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This doll house is awesome. It really is. I would give it 5 stars if I wasn’t missing pieces...like the stairs. The directions in my opinion are HORRIBLE. And trust the review that says “dont Try to put together Christmas Eve”. My hubby didn’t believe me. We started at 9pm and just finished at 430am and we even left the garage off because I read it was difficult. I would buy again but pay someone to assemble 😂
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality of material for the price of thus thing. Who in the world decided on the door knows for this thing? Whomever you are you need a shop class or two. One of them cracked apart and your trying to drive a huge screw in from the other side. The panels of the structure itself tend to crack at the sections where they get fastened together. And no its not from over-tightening. The size is cool but for the price I was really disappointed in the quality. Its the first and probably the last KidKraft I give my money towards.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Great large dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this dollhouse she got for Christmas. Took my husband 3 hours to assemble. Fairly good and easy to understand assembly instructions. Sturdy wooden dollhouse, much better quality than a plastic Barbie dream house. The furniture/accessories are adorable. Would purchase again and def recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Frinkles

customer_reviews.title: Great and worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very LARGE! This item was purchased by me and I did not read the dimensions but if you are working with a smaller space, I would highly recommend reaching measurements. Love the house and so does my daughter but it takes up a lot of space. My daughter loves the props and she uses her Barbies and any other little characters she has laying around to live it in the house. Very sturdy and love heavy frame because my daughter is a rough on toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sade KMassi

customer_reviews.title: Simply divine
customer_reviews.text: MUCH better quality that I could've ever hoped for! Got this for my daughter for Christmas. I was really worried it wouldn't arrive on time and it arrived before the shipping expected date and it worked out perfectly. It did take me and my husband 2 1/2 hours to build and was bigger than I expected it to be which was a plus for my daughter! My daughter was amazed that she got such a big "dream house" from Santa. I would defiantly recommend that you get this product, it is of extremely good quality for the price. It's very hard for me to keep my daughter away from it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse is beyond what any child could dream of. It is sturdy and well made. Putting it together was time consuming but very easy to follow and assemble. It's been over a year and it's still intact and survived a 3 hour move with no problems. I would recommend anyone who wants to blow their princesses mind to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dollhouse!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest dollhouses. The directions are a bit confusing and took me (just one person) 3.5 hours to put together and I’m good with assembling things. One tip is to look at the pictures of it online to help figure out which way the boards face. However it was well worth it! My kids love it. You can fit all kinds of characters your child probably already has in this dollhouse. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This dollhouse is pretty awesome! My 3 yr old loves it. It is very well made, very colorful, furniture is cute, and it provides lots of fun time and creates imagination for my daughter. I would highly recommend this dollhouse. The only downfall to this product is the assembly directions, they are terrible, but you tube has several assembly videos that are very helpful if you need to see how the parts are assembled. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this dollhouse and neither will the little girl you purchase it for. :)
customer_reviews.author: pmcrn99

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing is awesome. Really did take 3 hours to put together but it was very fun and easy once you got going. The furniture it came with is amazing. I don’t know why some of the reviews were negative about the construction or the furniture, because mine was perfect. My daughter who is 5 has not stopped playing with this. Great dollhouse
customer_reviews.author: Kelly demetriades

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3 year old daughter and the dollhouse is taller than her! However, it is sturdy and durable so I know it will last her a couple more years at most. It was easy to assemble but did take a long time to do so as it came with may pieces. We did have all the pieces in the box and instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R. Bordeaux

customer_reviews.title: Nieces love it and it's good quality for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Nieces love it and it's good quality for the most part. However, it took me 5.5 hours to put together; yes you read that right. I build this stuff ALL the time so I'm quick to realize when things are backwards/upside down on the directions than they are on the photos (which happens A LOT with this particular set... helpful tip: build the elevator based on the photo, NOT the instructions or it will be completely messed up) and it still took me forever. I could see it taking a novice a good 7+ hours.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great large doll house
customer_reviews.text: The boy is very heavy and took a wheeled dolly to get it down the driveway. a lot of pieces and took a very long time to put together, but is made very sturdy and the kids will get a lot of use out of it. The cost was the main factor as usually houses this big are way more expensive, but this worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves this house. She can’t reach the attic/nursery without a step stool, but that’s no problem. The house took about 2 hours to assemble and includes some very nice accessories. The dollhouse easily accommodates 10 dolls, some Barbies, some Disney Princess dolls. Would highly recommend this dollhouse!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen T

customer_reviews.title: Priceless results
customer_reviews.text: The instructions need to be written out instead of the pictures of how each parts is done. It was hard to understand & took my bf & I 4 days to get it put together. But the end result was priceless cuz our 5 year old Great niece Auhdrina absolutely loved it. It was the most wonderful Christmas present she had this year.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest/Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute house. Instructions were not the clearest (very ikea-esque if you've ever dealt with them before) parts of the stickers are already pulling away too. Things were not always able to line up and it shows in the finished product. It's for my daughter's birthday and I know she will love it and not notice the imperfections but let's just say I'm very glad I didn't pay full price for this house.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Doll Mansion.
customer_reviews.text: This Doll Mansion is incredible. It is gigantic, sturdy, wooden, fun and totally worth the time and effort it took to put together. This was a gift to my daughters for Christmas and they play with it everyday. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase, another great item from kidkraft worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: All wood and absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews on here unless something is incredibly bad or incredibly good. This one is incredibly good. Upon reading the reviews thought I would give it a shot, and I could not be happier. An amazing amount of furniture included with it that is completely wooden hand-painted. I would recommend this want to anyone. Completely exceeded my expectations. Assembly time took about two hours. Do not use any power tools on it no matter how low the setting. It needs to be built by hand to be correct and doublecheck all of your fittings to make sure they are snug. Is just beautiful! My daughter is going to flip out when she sees it!
customer_reviews.author: JLM73

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but time consuming and difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many KidKraft products in the past and have rated them all with 5 stars. This time I had to give 4 stars because one part was warped, the instructions were photos only (no written instructions) were difficult to interpret and many parts were missing part numbers, plus it should have included a color final product picture to assist in assembling. It took close to 5 hours for two people to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, sturdy, well made Barbie sized doll house
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, the instructions are not perfect. They lack detail and they fail to specify which way the pieces should face. The trick is to frequently review the photos on Amazon, and be prepared to loosen the screws and bolts until you get the pieces in place, and then to tighten them. In the end, I was able to put this doll house together in about 2 hours with a Philips screwdriver, and the Allen wrench that came with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: techie1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my daughter 4 year old and son 2.5. I have put it together all by myself in one evening. Kids loved it and they still do and I think it will be used for years. We started to have a lot of pretend play too which my daughter with DD didn`t have before. It is like a new level. Added some furniture from IKEA which we had before, but it is not needed as it is fully furnished. My son of course likes elevator.They play with it everyday. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this doll house! I wish I had one as a child. The backgrounds are a thin sheet of paper and in some corners they are pealing up. It’s not really noticeable. I only gave this 4 stars because the directions were horrible... I finally understood it but someone who isn’t great with putting stuff together might have a hard time. This took about 3hrs to put together. The box was damaged (only the bed was damaged) but it was a warehouse deal so for $120 I am very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sebrina

customer_reviews.title: Blows Barbie dream house away.
customer_reviews.text: The house wasn’t to hard to put together. I thought I was going to have to put the furniture together but it was all assembled except for the bed and piano. The wife absolutely loves it. The instructions were good, the would have been better if the were in color or had a pattern of the panels. This would have helped with the orientation in some spots. I used the picture online. It is sturdy and pretty well built. I am sure the little girl is going to love and enjoy it for along time.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love this house
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her doll house. It is hugr and fits her Barbies perfectly. The Door was cracked snd peeling we applied super glue to fix it and it was fine. It took about 3 hours to assemble. It is very heavy about 100 pounds is what it feels like.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

product_meta.title: KidKraft Majestic Mansion Dollhouse
product_meta.description: The KidKraft Majestic Mansion Wooden Dollhouse is the ultimate dream dollhouse. Standing over 4.5 feel tall and 4 feet wide, this dollhouse is ginormous and totally full of fun times. It has interactive features in each of the 8 spacious rooms and gives your child the ability to decorate however their heart desires. With 34 pieces of furniture included, the decorating possibilities are endless. As if the gliding elevator, garage doors, windows, and loft weren't cool enough, the grandfather clock and cute little kitten make this mansion even cooler. It accommodates dolls up to 12 inches tall, is made from strong, composite wood material, and the KidKraft Majestic Mansion Dollhouse is ready for years of fabulous play time fun.
feature_bullets: Packaged with detailed, step-by-step assembly instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,037 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
